formElement.label: Login As:
formElement.documentation: The user name and password to use to connect to the specified TestTrack URL.

formElement.label: URL:
formElement.documentation: The URL to use to connect to a TestTrack server. For example: http://10.10.10.10:8080 or http://yourTestTrackserver

formElement.label: Project:
formElement.documentation: A unique project for this configuration.

formElement.label: Defect type:
formElement.documentation: A type for the commited defects in this configuration.

formElement.label: Commit User:
formElement.documentation: A unique user commiting defects in this configuration.
